Package com.example.appointment.controller

Class LoginController

java.lang.Object
com.example.appointment.controller.Controller
com.example.appointment.controller.LoginController
All Implemented Interfaces:
AddListenerInterface, SQLControllerInterface
public class LoginController extends Controller implements AddListenerInterface
Controller that provides the user with a page to login and change their language at. Includes exception handling to account for blank, or incorrect usernames and passwords.

  • Method Details

    • setDefaultControllerLanguage

      public void setDefaultControllerLanguage()
      This is a method that calls all the language translations methods to make it simpler to translate everything in the application.

    • setZoneIdLabel

      public void setZoneIdLabel()
      Changes the Time Zone label to the user's current ZoneID.

    • setLanguageChoiceBox

      public void setLanguageChoiceBox(Locale userLocal)
      Sets up the language choice box so that the user can pick their language using it. The method works by first getting the current language of the users OS, then it sets the choice box to that setting and translates the login page to the user's setting. It then sets up the setOnAction method so that a user can change the language if they wish.
      Parameters:
      userLocal - The current locale of the user.

    • setControllerResourceBundle

      public void setControllerResourceBundle(ActionEvent event)
      This method changes the Resource Bundle for the Login Controller by changing the locale and then reloading the stage. It changes the locale to match what the user selects from the choice box and resets the stage and stage title using that information.
      Parameters:
      event - Takes in that a Language from the choice box was selected.

    • changeSceneToMainController

      public void changeSceneToMainController(ActionEvent event)
      Changes the scene to the main controller page to display the user's appointments. This method is overridden because it has to make the login credentials are valid, and it has to display an alert if an appointment is within 15 minute of login.
      Overrides:
      changeSceneToMainController in class Controller
      Parameters:
      event - Takes in that the login button was pressed.
